verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and let my \w cry|strong="H7775"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 102.1 \ft of: or, for\f*

\w Hide|strong="H5641"\w* not thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from me in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add when\add* I am in \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*; \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* unto me: in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add when\add* I \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* me \w speedily|strong="H4118"\w*.

For my \w days|strong="H3117"\w* are \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* like \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w*, and my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* are \w burned|strong="H2787"\w* as an \w hearth|strong="H4168"\w*.\f + \fr 102.3 \ft like…: or, (as some read) into smoke\f*

My \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*, and \w withered|strong="H3001"\w* like \w grass|strong="H6212"\w*; so that I \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* my \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

By reason of the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of my \w groaning|strong="H0585"\w* my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* to my \w skin|strong="H1320"\w*.\f + \fr 102.5 \ft skin: or, flesh\f*
I am \w like|strong="H1819"\w* a \w pelican|strong="H6893"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: I am like an \w owl|strong="H3563"\w* of the \w desert|strong="H2723"\w*.
I \w watch|strong="H8245"\w*, and am as a \w sparrow|strong="H6833"\w* \w alone|strong="H0909"\w* upon the house \w top|strong="H1406"\w*.

Mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2778"\w* me all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; \add and\add* they that are \w mad|strong="H1984"\w* against me are \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* against me.
For I have \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w* like \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w mingled|strong="H4537"\w* my \w drink|strong="H8249"\w* with \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*,
\w Because|strong="H6440"\w* of thine \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w* and thy \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w*: for thou hast lifted me \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and cast me \w down|strong="H7993"\w*.
My \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add are\add* like a \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* that \w declineth|strong="H5186"\w*; and I am \w withered|strong="H3001"\w* like \w grass|strong="H6212"\w*.

But thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, shalt \w endure|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; and thy \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* unto \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

Thou shalt \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \add and\add* have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: for the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* to \w favour|strong="H2603"\w* her, yea, the set \w time|strong="H4150"\w*, is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.
For thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* take \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* in her \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w favour|strong="H2603"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* thereof.

So the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and all the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.
When the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall build \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, he shall \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* in his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.
He will \w regard|strong="H6437"\w* the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of the \w destitute|strong="H6199"\w*, and not \w despise|strong="H0959"\w* their \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*.

This shall be \w written|strong="H3789"\w* for the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* to \w come|strong="H0314"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which shall be \w created|strong="H1254"\w* shall \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*.

For he hath looked \w down|strong="H8259"\w* from the \w height|strong="H4791"\w* of his \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* did the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w behold|strong="H5027"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

To \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w groaning|strong="H0603"\w* of the \w prisoner|strong="H0615"\w*; to \w loose|strong="H6605"\w* those that are \w appointed|strong="H1121"\w* to \w death|strong="H8546"\w*;\f + \fr 102.20 \ft those…: Heb. the children of death\f*

To \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and his \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*;

When the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* are \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, and the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*, to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

He \w weakened|strong="H6031"\w* my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; he \w shortened|strong="H7114"\w* my \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 102.23 \ft weakened: Heb. afflicted\f*

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, take me not \w away|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* of my \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: thy \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \add are\add* throughout \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

Of \w old|strong="H6440"\w* hast thou laid the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: and the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \add are\add* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

They shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, but thou shalt \w endure|strong="H5975"\w*: yea, all of them shall wax \w old|strong="H1086"\w* like a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*; as a \w vesture|strong="H3830"\w* shalt thou \w change|strong="H2498"\w* them, and they shall be \w changed|strong="H2498"\w*:\f + \fr 102.26 \ft endure: Heb. stand\f*
But thou \add art\add* the same, and thy \w years|strong="H8141"\w* shall have no \w end|strong="H8552"\w*.

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w continue|strong="H7931"\w*, and their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.
